name: Martini Oaxaqueño (Mezcal Dirty Martini With Castelvetrano Olives)
description: This drink, slightly adapted from Cala in San Francisco, is really a hybrid of a martini and a mezcal margarita, made savory, rich, and somewhat salty with the addition of Castelvetrano olive brine.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces (45ml) Castelvetrano olive brine (Divina brand preferred; see note)
4 dashes Bar Keep Fennel Bitters (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Chill 2 martini glasses. Thread 2 cocktail picks with 2 olives each.

Add mezcal, Mandarine Napoléon, lime juice, olive brine, and bitters to a cocktail shaker and fill 2/3 full with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into chilled glasses, garnishing each with a cocktail pick. Serve immediately.
